tasks.description: Research comprehensive audit methodologies and frameworks from professional auditing standards

initial_tool_thoughts.reasoning: No initial tool thoughts provided - consider which tools you'll need

planning_phase.phase_guidance: Focus on understanding requirements and planning approach

execution_phase.description: Execute: Research comprehensive audit methodologies and frameworks from professional auditing standards
execution_phase.phase_guidance: Focus on careful implementation and testing

execution_evidence: Research completed using context7-mcp and cybersecurity DevSecOps resources
Sequential thinking used to design comprehensive cognitive audit framework architecture
6 core audit frameworks identified: Security, Compliance, Quality, Process, Financial, IT
Systematic investigation methodology designed with 4 phases: Planning, Evidence Gathering, Analysis, Reporting
Architecture plan created mirroring panda_plan tool with cognitive frameworks
Implementation plan finalized for modular extensible system

execution_evidence: Comprehensive systems thinking analysis completed using framework guidance

Transformation requirements documented with new framework structure design

tasks.description: Design cognitive auditing frameworks similar to panda_plan's mental models but for auditing

execution_evidence: Design thinking approach used to create user-centered audit frameworks
New AuditFramework TypedDict structure created with investigation_questions, methodology, evidence_requirements, evaluation_criteria, reporting_structure, and risk_assessment_approach
6 comprehensive cognitive audit frameworks designed and implemented: Security, Compliance, Quality, Process, Financial, and IT audits
Each framework includes systematic investigation questions, 4-phase methodology, professional evidence requirements, and structured reporting
Frameworks follow professional auditing standards and provide LLM guidance for systematic investigation
Audit_frameworks module created with proper imports and structure
